title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.3 - Method of claiming reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.3 - Method of claiming reimbursement

State Regulations

Reimbursement for assistance to refugees, entrants or
other noncitizens of New York shall be claimed in accordance with instructions
and directions of the department and upon formats prescribed by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
616.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
